title: march 25: here comes Grindr
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the invention of Grindr, the first big dating app for gay men, and a precursor to the location-based dating apps that have become so popular today. Afterwards, she talks about the legacy of one of soul’s biggest names, Aretha Franklin. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
